statements: SELECT * FROM ProteinSamples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, experiment_date FROM ProteinSamples WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, experiment_date, researcher_name FROM ProteinSamples WHERE project_name = 'Project ABC';
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM ProteinSamples WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sample_id, project_name, researcher_name FROM ProteinSamples ORDER BY project_name DESC, researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProteinSamples WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT sample_name, project_name FROM ProteinSamples WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sample_name ASC;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, researcher_name FROM ProteinSamples WHERE project_name LIKE '%Cancer%' AND experiment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(DISTINCT researcher_name) AS researcher_count FROM ProteinSamples GROUP BY project_name HAVING researcher_count > 1 ORDER BY researcher_count DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(*) AS sample_count FROM ProteinSamples GROUP BY researcher_name ORDER BY sample_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM ProteinSamples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, sample_type FROM ProteinSamples WHERE sample_origin = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM ProteinSamples ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, sample_type, storage_location FROM ProteinSamples WHERE sample_type = 'Antibody' AND sample_origin = 'Asia';
SELECT experiment_date, experiment_description, researcher_name FROM ExperimentLogs WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY experiment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProteinSamples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, sample_type FROM ProteinSamples WHERE sample_origin = 'Laboratory' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type, sample_origin FROM ProteinSamples WHERE storage_location = 'Freezer 1' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ExperimentLogs WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice' AND experiment_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT sample_id, sample_name, experiment_date, experiment_description FROM ProteinSamples JOIN ExperimentLogs ON ProteinSamples.sample_id = ExperimentLogs.sample_id WHERE ExperimentLogs.researcher_name = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM protein_samples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM protein_samples ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT sample_id, sample_type FROM protein_samples WHERE sample_type = 'Bacterial' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiment_details WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result, analyst_name FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM protein_samples;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type FROM protein_samples WHERE sample_type = 'Control';
SELECT * FROM experiment_details ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT sample_name, experiment_date FROM protein_samples JOIN experiment_details ON protein_samples.sample_id = experiment_details.sample_id;
SELECT analysis_result, analyst_name FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProteinSamples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM ProteinSamples WHERE sample_type='Type1';
SELECT sample_name, date_collected FROM ProteinSamples ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT * FROM ExperimentResults WHERE result_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM Researchers;
SELECT * FROM ProteinSamples;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, date_collected FROM ProteinSamples WHERE sample_type = 'Control';
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University';
SELECT result_description, experiment_date FROM ExperimentResults ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_date, log_description FROM ExperimentLogs WHERE researcher_id = 5 ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProteinSamples;
SELECT sample_name, collection_date FROM ProteinSamples WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS total_samples FROM ProteinSamples GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 5;
SELECT result_id, experiment_id, result_date, result_comments FROM Results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProteinSamples WHERE sample_id = 1
SELECT sample_name, collection_date FROM ProteinSamples WHERE project_id = 5 ORDER BY collection_date DESC
SELECT project_name, researcher_name, collection_date FROM Projects JOIN Researchers ON Projects.project_lead_id = Researchers.researcher_id
SELECT sample_name, experiment_date FROM ProteinSamples JOIN Experiments ON ProteinSamples.sample_id = Experiments.sample_id WHERE project_id = 3 ORDER BY experiment_date ASC
SELECT result_data, result_comments FROM Experiments JOIN Results ON Experiments.experiment_id = Results.experiment_id WHERE result_id = 7
